Class: Epoch.Chart.Scatter

Defined in: coffee/charts/scatter.coffee
Inherits: Epoch.Chart.Plot

Overview

Static scatter plot implementation (using d3).

Instance Method Summary

  • # (void) draw() Draws the scatter plot.
